attributes.action: Prevent Ebay from selling Festival / Gig tickets forcing people to pay exorbant amounts of money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition, as the title suggests, is to prevent Ebay from allowing people / touts to auction off festival / gig / event tickets at rediculous prices. 

 I myself on numerous occasions have gone to buy tickets maybe a couple of hours after they have gone on sale, only to find they are sold out and that a ticket costing £150.00, now costs £350 or more on Ebay.

 It is totally unnaceptable and Ebay's response basically suggested to me, they don't care, they're making too much money from it. It is ruining the live entertainment scene and really getting out of hand.
 
 I also have a hard copy and am well on the way to getting siginatures as so many people also feel strongly about this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
